name: Austin Meyer
text: No showed us twice without calling. Then repeat called after the second no show, one call right after another. Terrible service,

name: Brad Beasley
text: I don't recommend this business. We made an appointment request online and waited but never got a call so we called the store a couple days later. Spoke with a lady who took our information and said someone would be in touch with us to schedule an appointment. We waited 3 more days and still no call. I called again and spoke with Greg and made an appointment for him to come to our house 2 days later. He didn't show or call. I called to see what happened and he was at another job that ran over and he didn't have my phone # to call and update me. When I complained he told me to find someone else to do my closet. Obviously when you have this many problems just trying to get a quote you do NOT want to work these people.

name: Selina Mason
text: Greg and crew were able to accommodate a fast turnaround with expert installation and a top quality product. I have been very happy with the results.

name: Robin Mitchell
text: Owner Greg Hall is incredibly talented and has a knack for this.....affordable  and efficient.

name: Ruckedup G
text: Great service for all your closet needs!

name: Daniel Perkins
text: Closet orderly van was speeding, passing cars in double stripe zones, and running stop signs in 25 mph residential area.
